message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I can only pay up to $90 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but I can't go below $110 for this product. It's really high quality and worth the investment.
Hello Alice, I understand the value of your product, but I can only offer $95. This is my final offer.
